reviewtext: The sound is good with these headphones and I use them to watch movies and You Tube.  My only problem is that after awhile the ear pads start to bother my ears and I have to take them off. It would be nice if there was an adjustment not only for size, but for width. It would also be nice if there was a little padding at the top. Otherwise they are good for the price and they are not big and bulky, which was why I bought them in the first place.
